statements.select:
SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY AA.Name) as RowNo , BB.ID , BB.CreatedOn , BB.CreatedBy , BB.CreatedByName , BB.UpdatedOn , BB.UpdatedBy , BB.UpdatedByName
, AA.SiteID as SiteID , AA.ID as ScrapColorID , BB.SmapsColorID as SmapsColorID
, AA.Name as ScrapColorName , CC.text as SmapsColorName
FROM IKScrap.dbo.TScrapColor AA WITH (NOLOCK) LEFT JOIN IKScrap.dbo.TScrapColorToSmaps BB WITH (NOLOCK) ON AA.ID = BB.ScrapColorID LEFT JOIN IKScrap.dbo.TSmapsColor CC WITH (NOLOCK) ON BB.SmapsColorID = CC.ID WHERE AA.SiteID = #SiteID#
AND BB.SmapsColorID IS NOT NULL
AND BB.SmapsColorID IS NULL
AND ( AA.Name LIKE '%'+#FindText#+'%' OR CC.text LIKE '%'+#FindText#+'%' )
ORDER BY RowNo
SELECT * FROM IKScrap.dbo.TScrapColorToSmaps WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE ID = #ID#
SELECT * FROM IKScrap.dbo.TScrapColorToSmaps WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE ScrapColorID = #ScrapColorID#
statements.insert:
INSERT INTO dbo.TScrapColorToSmaps ( CreatedOn, CreatedBy, CreatedByName, ScrapColorID, SmapsColorID ) VALUES ( GetDate(), #CreatedBy#, #CreatedByName#, #ScrapColorID#, #SmapsColorID# )
SELECT @@IDENTITY AS ID
statements.update:
UPDATE IKScrap.dbo.TScrapColorToSmaps SET UpdatedOn = GetDate() , UpdatedBy = #UpdatedBy# , UpdatedByName = #UpdatedByName#
, ScrapColorID = #ScrapColorID# , SmapsColorID = #SmapsColorID# WHERE ID = #ID#
